Abstract

The Northwest C++ Users Group will be hosting three panels at CPPCon!

  • Monday 09/19/2016 - Evening: Grill The Committee/The Future of C++

item.title: March 16th 2016: Linux and IoT for VC Users
item.description:
Time and Location

March 16th, 2016 at 7:00 PM
Steptoe Room, Cafeteria 40,
Microsoft Campus,
156th Ave NE,
Redmond, WA 98052.

Abstract

Marc Goodner will talk about debugging remotely on Linux, debugging MCU targets and connecting to the Azure IoT hub, all from within Visual Studio.

Links to further …
